summary: An email exchange regarding a PTZ Trigger System between Steve Smith, a Federal Sales Representative at SigNet Technologies, and an Engineering Technician at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York Federal Bureau of Prisons. The MCC technician is seeking a quote for a surveillance system project similar to one installed in Chicago.

keyFacts: The document is an email regarding a PTZ Trigger System, a type of surveillance technology, requested for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York.
Steve Smith is identified as a Federal Sales Representative for SigNet Technologies, a company providing security/surveillance systems.
The request references a similar system previously installed at a site in Chicago by colleagues.
The correspondence is dated April 10, 2018, which is after Jeffrey Epstein's 2008 conviction but before his 2019 arrest.
The document is part of the Epstein case files (EFTA00126262), suggesting it may relate to surveillance systems at facilities where Epstein was held or investigated.
